labeling.description: Configuration that controls how we apply score category labels to each assessed pull request

applyCategoryLabels.description: Whether or not to apply the category label to each assessed pull request

excludeDraftPullRequests.description: Whether or not to skip applying the category label to a draft pull request

categoryLabelPrefix.description: The prefix to add to each category label that we apply

commenting.description: Configuration that controls how we add comments to assessed pull requests

addCommentWhenScoreThresholdHasBeenExcee.description: Whether or not to add a comment to each assessed pull request that exceeds the configured score threshold

excludeDraftPullRequests.description: Whether or not to skip commenting on a draft pull request that exceeds the configured score threshold

scoreThreshold.description: The score above which this tool will post a comment on the pull request.

commentTemplate.description: The template for the comment that should be added to each pull request that exceeds the configured score threshold

optIns.description: A list of GitHub handles for pull request authors that have opted into this workflow. If this configuration key is omitted, then the workflow runs for pull requests opened by all authors.

shadowOptOuts.description: Whether or not to compute a score even for users who have opted out of the workflow

artifacts.description: Configuration options for persisting the output of this workflow.

score.description: Configuration for the workflow artifact that contains details about the score

format.description: The file format to use for the score artifact

retention.description: Retention period (in days) for the score artifact. The actual retention period used may be shorter than this in the presence of an overriding repository- or organization- level retention period setting.

excludeDraftPullRequests.description: Whether or not to skip creating the artifact for workflow runs on a draft pull request
